name: Cultivar
description:
Nurture cute gardens and aim for a high score! Make sure each plant's specific needs are met, and watch out for weeds and random trash getting in your way.

 

If there's trash, you could always try growing a plant in it...

Cultivar is a quick, turn-based puzzle/strategy game. Each turn, you choose one action from a hand of cards, and use those to sow seeds, water plants, clear cut weeds, and so much more. The goal is to cultivate a lovely garden and get the highest score you can.

Try out all 5 scenarios, including a daily challenge!


Team: Zalinius and Darzington

Our submission to the 2022 Cultivation Jam, with the secondary theme "Household Goods".

See the full credits for art assets.
